item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library 
Mass Ave 
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor

Brick Marketing

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest 
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:30 - 8:15 In-House Experts Site Review Panel

Submit your site for review by our experts! Get some great advice on how to improve your website for traffic and conversions. Will try to review several sites recommended with a projector set up for live optimization reviews.

1st Website Review:

www.UltimateSocialFreedom.com

Specific Challenges:

  • Young Domain: 6-8 months old
  • Social Freedom Concept: Different than how most people might define "Social Freedom"
  • Win "Boston Dating Coach" keyword

Keywords:
Dating Expert
College Speaker
Motivational Speaker
Boston Dating Coach
Date Coaching
Dating Coaching
Dating Coach for Men
Dating Coaches
Social Freedom

Best Advice Given at the Event Prize: In addition to winning a potential new client, you'll also get a signed copy of "Being Alone Sucks!" by  Adam LoDolce

If we run out of site reviews, we will move on to a broader roundtable discussion and Q&A.

8:15 to 8:45 Open Q&A

Time to get & share advice to help fellow internet marketers.

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

---------------------------------- 
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.
item.how_to_find_us: Take elevator to basement community room

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Cambridge/Arlington SEO Meetup
